data.description:
Immerse yourself in your favorite memories using Spatial Viewer by playing iPhone 15 Pro’s spatial video library on Meta Quest. This app allows you to directly access and view your spatial videos on a life-size scale, bringing a new dimension to your memories and experiences.

Key Features:
• Watch Spatial Videos: Sync your Google Drive folder with Spatial Videos to play any spatial video directly from Meta Quest.
• Convert Spatial Video to 3D: Our companion app Spatial Viewer for iOS takes your spatial videos and converts them into immersive 3D formats that are playable on your Meta Quest.

DESIGNED TO BE USER-FRIENDLY.

How It Works:

1. Install Spatial Viewer companion app on your iPhone 15 Pro or Pro Max.
2. In 1-tap, convert the spatial video & send to Google Drive
3. Now you simply open “Spatial Viewer” on your Meta Quest and the videos will all be available there, since they are all synced via the cloud in Google Drive.

*Uploaded videos are stored on Google Drive servers. Your headset will need to be connected to the Internet to view them.

Spatial Viewer’s use and transfer of information received from Google APIs to any other app will adhere to the Google API Services User Data Policy, including the Limited Use requirements. Learn more in our Privacy Policy.
